name: Go Get Yourself
description:
In this short game you play as a ghost, trying to get his body back to his grave. You can jump as many times as you want, but with every extra jump, you sacrifice 1 second. Try to get gold on all levels and please report feedback or bugs in the comments :)

-Made for the Spooktober gamejam 2021

Credits:

Music: https://retroindiejosh.itch.io/music-pack-6

Background: https://free-game-assets.itch.io/parallax-halloween-2d-game-backgrounds

Font 1: https://www.dafont.com/hallowen.font

Font2: https://www.dafont.com/halloween-4.font

UI sounds: https://ellr.itch.io/universal-ui-soundpack
